website_summaries.verdict: A small budget tent that can last if you zip and unzip with care.
pros: Tent with removable Mylar floor tray, filter straps
Reflective tear-proof Mylar with heavy-duty zippers
Thick tent material reinforced by metal pole ensures security and stability
Keeps odors in and pests out
cons: Plants taller than 2.5 feet may hit your light fixture

customer_reviews.title: Two things to watch out for
customer_reviews.text: First the tent itself is very nice, Nice zipper and nice fabric. Little light leaks out. The inside has diamond mylar with enough openings to vent or whatever. Now the two things to watch out for. 1. The instructions are not accurate. You have to assemble the frame inside the tent not fold the tent around as shown. 2. The frame is too big for the tent. I had to shorten both ends of most of the poles in order for them to be assembled. There was no way I could have put the frame together as it was. Now that it is up, I do like it but I shouldn't have to modify it so it can be assembled.
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: 1 year later, still in great shape. Easy to open.
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say, for the price, this was a killer deal. My 4', 4bulb, t5 light fixture fits in it perfectly, and works great for starting seedlings, and also vegging young plants. I've been using it on and off for close to a year. My favorite part is the Zipper: Only one seam to unzip. My Gorilla grow tent takes 5 (! yes, 5 separate zippers!) to open the front, so I appreciate there only being one zipper. NOTE: This tent is NOT light proof... although no tents are really. Even my Gorilla tent has light leaks. But if you are ok with this, this tent is an amazing bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Turner

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 Apollo tents
customer_reviews.text: I really love these Apollo tents. I have one of their 4x4x7 and now purchased this 2x4x5 from them. Couldn't be happier. Literally no problems.
customer_reviews.author: @TheBakedNurse

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tent, just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality tent. Material is thick, zipper is good and plenty of pass through for cords, fans and vents. Easy pass through has draw strings to ensure no light leakage. There is a removable double bottom so you can clean up after a grow without disassembling the tent. Reflective material inside is nice. Well thought out. Seems to be worth more than I paid. The top cross bar can support up to 110# for lights and fans. Can’t say enough how pleased I am with this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: It's our first grow tent, and we are impressed. Set-up was super easy, and the bars are sturdy. The tent material is thick/good quality, and no light peeks through. Not even through the zipper. Love the touch of the tray, but somewhat unnecessary, because we have plastic trays for our planters. Soon we'll need to purchase a vent fan and filter, so I'll update the review when we actually use the 6" vent holes. Overall the best deal I could find for this particular size bag, and would by this and other Apollo Horticulture products again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy D.

customer_reviews.title: Great small tent!
customer_reviews.text: For me it is working great. I bought some wimpy tomato plants and tripled their size in two weeks. Autoflower weed is kicking butt in it but I would should have bought bigger tent. This will be my stater tent for my garden, but I will buy a bigger tent in the future. You do have to be careful when putting it together, as I had to sew a seam at the start of the zipper. No light leakage unless I need to vent it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Brooks

customer_reviews.title: the setup is easy although youd benefit from a friendly party to help ...
customer_reviews.text: Would have given five stars had it not have had small tears and holes at some parts of the tent. Make sure you go through the measurements and really make sure that this is the size that you need. This would fit snugly in a closet and would meet your clandestine needs. A 400w apollo grow light barely fit, so make sure once again that you are familiar with the measurements of this here tent. The zipper is aight, the setup is easy although youd benefit from a friendly party to help assemble. Once again a five star product sadly mine had little holes. Im just gonna tape dem bitches and be good. Good tent otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lemus

customer_reviews.title: Both options are adjustable depending on what location you would like to mount the light
customer_reviews.text: Very solid grow tent. Metal pole frame assembles with ease a locks together with steel pins. Make for a study skeleton for the heavy duty canvas body. My tent block out light very well. All zippers were in proper working order and fairly large and heavy duty themselves. Apollo give you 2 option for supporting light with-in the tent. 1 long bar that goes across the top or 2 short bars that go across the top. Both options are adjustable depending on what location you would like to mount the light. This 2 foot by 4 foot by 5 foot tent is plenty large enough for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality small light leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tent compared to my last one. The only down side is the couple pinhole light leaks that i covered with duct tape. Got the actual size advertised unlike my last tent being 3 inches shorter in height. Would recommend my Apollo horticulture tent to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Vapen4daze

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: After 30 days of using... there is definitely leakage out of the bottom. With tray and liner it still manages to get on my floor so I would throw a tarp down. Also. That window that a lot of these have, I actually would love it if it had one. Would make it way easier to peek in on things without disturbing anything. Could use another outlet hole on the bottom, opposite side. It’s doing the work but it’s not as seamless as I imagined .
customer_reviews.author: Guillermina Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!  I can think of no deficiencies!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is built better than I'd hoped at this price. The zippers are very heavy and very little light leaks through. From a foot away I can't tell the 1200 watts of LED panels are even on inside. The ports in the sides are perfect for 6" ventilation intakes, and a 6" port in the top works well as an exhaust. The structure of the tent is adequate, and with two LED light units and a large 6" duct fan on top, it doesn't feel the least bit wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: I have only used vivosun in the past but with the great reviews I thought I would give this apollo a try. That was a mistake. I just assembled my tent and the first time I zipped it closed, both zippers came off. There is also a huge gap where the stitching wasn't complete. Total bummer. I'll be sending it back and ordering vivosun.
customer_reviews.author: Destiney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, well thought out.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions weren't very clear, since pictures were not accurate. Easy to put frame together, since each piece is identified, but tough to get shell on. Zipper seems solid, tent seems solid. If I had it to do over I would get a tent closer to a square shape rather than rectangle. Great vents, duct vents with double blinds. Nice removable floor.
customer_reviews.author: Sue, central PA

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by just how well this tent was made for the price I've looked at a few others and nothing came close for the price and size i was looking for. Do yourself a favor and look no more and get this one u will be glad u did.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent all the way around. Quality material and zipper with a sturdy frame and a good range of venting and air flow options. The interior is fully reflective and I like the floor pan as an added layer. Overall a high quality product at a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R

customer_reviews.title: 92.4% satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I like this tent a lot, However, there are two gripes I have with it. The instructions I got were for a different model. It did make getting the tent over frame a little chellenging. Onto the zippers. I don't know if I just got an off-unit or if everyone has this problem, but my zippers get stuck every couple of inches. It takes me a good minute just to close the thing. I couldn't get the bottom zipper around the front corner, so I can't shut the door all the way. That being said, I'm not complaining too hard and I'm excited to be able to get a head start on my garden this year.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mendicino

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I have built several of these in the past and this was the first time I decided to buy one. So far I am extremely happy with my purchase I reviewed several different companies and was impressed about what people had to say about this product. I purchased and I have no regrets I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: Kyle w

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice to have options
customer_reviews.text: The only lower access port is in the rear of tent, which depending on your setup, is not very versatile at all. While I anticipated this on order, my setup expanded and I now keep my reservoir outside of my tent. It would be nice to have options. Also, light leaks around zipper stitching more than anticipated. Overall its a decent tent with a solid frame but build with limited application in mind. Update, the tent is not actually 60" tall...someone at Apollo needs to learn to measure. The tent is actually a little over an inch shy in height although the width and depth are accurate.
customer_reviews.author: tonypalooza

customer_reviews.title: I got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.text: We put together the tent in a shower stall and we were missing the third stooge, lol. I am new to this and don't have a light yet to check for light leaks. This is a quality tent. If I stop growing, I will put the tent in the attic and hang clothes in it. We feel we got a lot for the money.
customer_reviews.author: peggieWho

customer_reviews.title: Good with some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Ok tent however light passes through around the stitching and will need foil tape to fix. Light also escapes in between zipper teeth when zipped up which not much you can do about it. The long hanger bar does not sit well with the shorter ones and instructions are not well written.
customer_reviews.author: Jad Aoun

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece.  Solidly built.  Great for starting vegetables early.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to start my veggie garden early. It came quickly, was easy to setup and is a quality piece. The Mylar is thick and seams are solidly sewn. Some reviewers have commented on the flimsiness of the bars but I have have been able to hang a T5HO fixture, a MH fixture and 2 LED grow lights from the top bars. No issues at all. Because of the MH bulb, I needed to install a small fan to circulate and exhaust the heat as this insulates the temperature and humidity. I have recommended this to my friends. I have been able to control all aspects of the temp/humidity/light and the little seedlings a growing quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Smuland

customer_reviews.title: B+
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality for this price bracket. There are less bells and whistles, most of which you won't miss at all. (Were you really going to use that window much, and not open the door to check on things? I doubt it.) No leaks so far, and decent-quality zipper. Great choice for the budding enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: wigshaker

customer_reviews.title: Came incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this tent for a small project For the summer and it came incomplete. The item was missing on Of the T connectors For the framework also the Velcro vent flaps for the sides of the tent were not inside the box when I unsealed it leaving the tent open to light leaks
customer_reviews.author: Sherry R

customer_reviews.title: 14 months on.. still perfect..
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these in december of 2018, it has been in use since i got it and it still is perfect, no light leaks, zippers are perfect.. would gladly buy another (if i had the spare cash right now) :) I had purchased a Uhura or something like that after and it's is sooo bad in comparison..
customer_reviews.author: Icetech

customer_reviews.title: ... grow some tomatoes during the winter because there’s nothing better than a bacon and tomato sandwich
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to grow some tomatoes during the winter because there’s nothing better than a bacon and tomato sandwich! Works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Kern

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love this tent
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this tent. It's perfect for us to grow our Tomato plants inside and to be able to regulate and control all the aspects for the juiciest tomatoes. This was our first adventure in trying hydro tomatoes and it's been a great success.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and thick
customer_reviews.text: I’m a real breathing person with no incentive to write a good review. Just want to help others with their decision making process. This is my 3rd tent and I love everything about it. Great grow tent. It’s very thick and sturdy and mine in particular doesn’t have any pinholes or light escaping. Sturdy zippers, 2 latitude hanging bar and 1 longitude hanging bars. 2-3 marshydro lights are the perfect setup for this . It has the perfect amount of vents and I’m happy that there’s a smaller vent for cords to run through. If your looking for a good brand, whatever size you need, this is a good get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a little bit taller,🎼
customer_reviews.text: Well built havent used it yet but great quality material and ez to put up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good tent at a really good price. Fits perfect in my room that didn't have much space to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Bstevens2729

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality. good zipper
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality. good zipper, sturdy metal snap on poles, no light leak, easy assembly and at a great price. running a 600w HPS sealed and cooled light housing. plenty of room to grow three plants, although tent is relatively short at 60" so height management skills (LST) is mandatory for control. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kori Rafiee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality grow tent! Enables complete control over your growing environment so you can grow just about anything that will not outgrow the tent. Not too difficult to assemble though a little challenging to get the tent over the frame. Once it's assembled, it's tight and everything functions as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: CJD51

customer_reviews.title: Great tent I recommend...
customer_reviews.text: This tent was a home run for me, works great with my T5HOs. Easy as hell to set up, nice venting and ducting holes in all the right places, heavy duty mylar, sturdy once all together, and fits in the corner of my bed room. The zippers are a little bit of a hassle at first as with any tent, but then they start flowing better once their broken in, just BE CAREFUL, ZIP SOFTLY. If you need a small grow tent, buy this its great.
customer_reviews.author: BLKv333

customer_reviews.title: A 24x48x60 tent arrived with floor tray straps ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Hello my name is Debbie I ordered the 24x48x60 tent. When it arrived two of the floor tray straps were ripped. Like ripped completely off. Not a huge deal. Wouldn’t ship it back. But when you buy something new and already ripped off two straps. Kinda like damn. Wish I would have been the one to rip them then. Or use it long enough for wear and tear to break it. So that’s my only complaint on a otherwise amazing tent. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah M.

customer_reviews.title: awesome grow tent
customer_reviews.text: awesome grow tent, I got my babies in there and they are growing and loving the led lights I installed. I would recommend this. just remember to lay the fabric out on the floor and wrap around once poles are together, also has lots of pockets for my fans and carbon filters.
customer_reviews.author: denise abbott

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Zipper works fine for me despite all the negative reviews about the zipper. Holds in all the light, I couldn't see any gaps. Easy to assemble for sure but the directions are indeed a waste of time past the frame build diagram. For the price compared to other models and grow tents, couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Made of very good quality at a decent price. Do not build this inside of the tent. Follow the instructions that comes with yours and you should be golden.
customer_reviews.author: Glynn Nichalson

customer_reviews.title: STILL A GREAT TENT FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: SOME OF THE POLES WERE JUST SLIGHTLY DIFFICULT TO GET TOGETHER AS THE TENT IS STRETCHED TO QUITE TIGHT AFTER ASSEMBLY. THE RIGHT FRONT WAS LITERALLY SEWN WAY TO SHORT AND I HAD TO HACKSAW AN INCH OFF OF ONE POLE IN ORDER TO STILL JUST BARELY GET THEM SPREAD ENOUGH TO CONNECT THEM. STILL A GREAT TENT FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Tent, But Leaks Light
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pin holes right out of the box, so light does escape. This is bad if you are trying to keep a stealth grow. Fortunately, I live in a state where growing is legal, and I keep the room it is in locked, so this isn't that big of an issue for me. You'll also notice plenty of light leaks around the zippers and seams. Other than that, this tent is easy to set up. There's room for three five-gallon DWC buckets in it, and it works just fine. No real complaints. I'm just glad that I wasn't counting on it being light tight, which it is definitely not.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry James

customer_reviews.title: I received the wrong color and size twice
customer_reviews.text: I have received the wrong size and color twice of this product. This road sand was supposed to be the taller version and I also wanted the black and green not black and purple.... Dial I am stuck with these 2 tents and do not have the boxes to return them and UPS is charging me $30 for a cardboard Box...
customer_reviews.author: Shane briley

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed. The material is good and putting it together was a breeze. No tools needed
customer_reviews.author: Classic62cheri

customer_reviews.title: Floor not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Be careful putting this on anything but cement. The floor "tray" is not waterproof, and even if it was the condensation running down the sides gets under it. I elevated mine on a furniture dolly so I could move it and boy was I glad I did. I have to place a towel under both ends and change it e.o. week or it drips all over the floor. Other than that it's great - easy to set up and nice materials.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It works if you’re on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, when I first started assembling it, it seemed as though it was flimsy but it seems to have a bit of hold to it. The tent part is also thick too and seems to hold in quite a bit of light with no light leak. I did struggle to get the tent part onto the metal frame but it worked out. Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.author: Sage W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, seems pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got this yesterday, set it up in approximately an hour and a half by myself in a pretty small room. Make sure that you are building it in the room where it will stay because it wouldn't fit through the door if I assembled out of the room. Follow the directions and it goes quite smoothly. Some people complained on here about it being too snug and difficult to put together, but I didn't seem to have those problems at all. Others said it's​ a 2 person job. While another person would be helpful, it wasn't that difficult to do by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Cubizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. No light leaks, assembled easily. Don't need any tools for the assembly. Lots of ventilation options. All zippers work well. Nice Velcro pieces on door to keep it held open. The only issue is that it can be difficult to control the temperatures with such a small tent. Plan on having exhaust and intake fans if you live in warmer climates.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Christopher Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nice reflective material! The pipes that hold it together seem pretty sturdy but I don't have much hanging off of it. Has 4 patches in the bottom on each side which is nice to get all the heat out. Good big entrance too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rubio

customer_reviews.title: The material is of good heavy quality
customer_reviews.text: Using two of these side-by-side in our grow room (hooked together via the vents & even added a secondary vent of our own). The material is of good heavy quality, the zippers are also of heavy quality and have stood up to hundred upon hundreds of opens/closes. Great product at a great price. I would highly recommend this tent.
customer_reviews.author: A. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and have been doing great with ...
customer_reviews.text: First Grow tent! Very easy to set up and have been doing great with my ViparSpectra LED light for starting and growing my Tomatos and Bell peppers! I just wish it came with instruction for what these other holes are for.... I'm lost on that part, so I just feed my cords through them lol..
customer_reviews.author: Hash

customer_reviews.title: Mylar horticultural unit
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. A T5 48 inch fluorescent lamp fits perfectly, a little vinegar and water for CO2 and blue tubes and red tubes make growing just about anything a snap. Here in Houston I get fresh tomatoes year round.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what to compare it to
customer_reviews.text: Can easily fit two tomatoe plants inside this, seems like nice quality but this is the only one I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pachin

customer_reviews.title: Nice construction, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love it, this is going to work out perfectly for my needs. It went together easily by myself, took maybe 15 minutes and that was while taking short beer breaks. It has plenty of portholes and I sat inside of it all zipped up and couldn't detect any light leaks to speak of. It has two velcro straps for a carbon filter which is nice and I love the size of the door opening. The zippers are beefy as well as the material. I would definitely buy another Apollo tent and may in the future if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Justin David Timmerman

customer_reviews.title: 10 times better than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: 10 times better than what I expected, I'm a prepper and grow all winter this will last for years and years. No brain power to put it together. Figure your size out, take the time and measure. Know where you are putting it, and you'll be a lot happier with it. GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.author: donald scarbath

customer_reviews.title: Wow..!! Very nice..!!
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for the price. Very well built and simple to assemble. The instructions are also very simple and easy to understand. I had all the lights, fan installed, the complete assembly completed in under 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent!!! I'm a new grower so it was hard trying to find a tent that was In my budget and was of good Quality. This tent is great!!! It's very durable and honestly hardly any light leak at all. I will be buying another very soon for vegging my plants.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best deals I have personally discovered on Amazon so far! Totallyover the moon with it, quick delivery, easy assembly and purple is my fav color to boot, lol. Highly recommend Apollo to any starters or seasoned indoor gardeners.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. I recently moved so I had to take it apart- The ends of all the tubes where they fit inside each other are rusted and the pins to hold the tubes together have rusted and fallen off. One I moved it, I realized that it was not water proof like my other tent and the floor underneath was becoming water damaged. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Tent
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this tent. It's the perfect size to hold comfortably 4 to 6, 5 gallon Smart Pots. I went with the Apollo GL100LED light too. They're a perfect pair and only get better when you add a 4" duct fan/filter combo from VenTech (all purchased on Amazon). The zipper is strong and thick with holes in the zipper handle to allow a Master Lock (got to keep the ladies safe). If you're thinking about buying this tent DON'T think about it...BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Taylor

customer_reviews.title: This is my second Apollo tent, I was so ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Apollo tent, I was so impressed with the first one I had to get another. Impressive construction, solid frames, no light leakage except from open ports and panels, and a very solid zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck R.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tent for the bigginer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tent for the bigginer. Adequate enough to Veg and Flower. Works well with 400 or 600 watt setup. Some light loss ; but for the price it will get you started and work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: joseph jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve paid more for lower quality tents. This was easy to put together and it’s good, thick material. The entire frame is metal and easy to put together and hangs everything without worry of collapse. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Tipton H.

customer_reviews.title: Love Apollo tents!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Apollo Hort. tent, I have the 48x48x80 for flowering, and now I'm using this 48x24x60 for my vegetative grow instead of the closet I had set up. I love these tents, plenty of exhaust and intake options, and excellent prices! I used to use a Lighthouse Hydro tent, I'll never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Indica

customer_reviews.title: This is great for our new little plants to start their lives ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great for our new little plants to start their lives in Alaska as we do not have much sun light and they will be good and ready when the summer comes around for transplant outside. works great to hold in the heat and light.
customer_reviews.author: Nana cope

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent fits 4 plants comfortably 6 overcrowded it, great tent for the price though!! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eba

customer_reviews.title: Apollo knocked it out of the park with this one! Well Made Tent, Heavy duty material !
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this tent, but I do recommend to have someone help you set it up, its a hassel with just one person setting it up, very good heavy duty material ,heavy duty zippers and decent metal poles all n all amazing product and shipping was very fast and was delivered in a Very Discrete box, will truely recommend this tent to anyone!!! Gonna be ordering their 300w led grow light in the next couple of days due to how satisfied I am with Apollo horticulture products...Well Done to you guys
customer_reviews.author: jason gage

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. It is not the most sturdy tent out there, but it will do the job just fine. Great bang for the buck. The reason for the star deduction is my inner tray lining had an issue. On 2 of the ties (that tie to the corner rails), the stitching was very poor and was loose right out of the package. Just a little pressure (could not even tie them) and they ripped off. Quality control does not seem to be up to snuff as there are nit-picky things about it, but for the price you cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Tobes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and move around. The reflective mylar was a huge bonus
customer_reviews.author: Chanpete

customer_reviews.title: Mildly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it the zipper didn't want to zip all the way. I had to zip it and unzip it completely several times before it loosened up enough to easily zip back and forth. It is ok now but not completely what I expected. All in all it is getting the job done for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Birnbaum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality... Perfect veg tent for 400 watt cool tube setup...
customer_reviews.text: This tent is surprisingly great quality... Love it and the dimensions are perfect for my 400 watt cool tube HPS set-up. Plan on using it as a veg tent for the perpetual cycle with my chosen herbs.
customer_reviews.author: lchew

customer_reviews.title: ... received my tent yesterday and set up was very easy. Packaging was discreet
customer_reviews.text: Just received my tent yesterday and set up was very easy. Packaging was discreet. The only issue is with the purple straps on the removable tray, two broke off during installation.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, excellent sturdy zippers
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, excellent sturdy zippers, no light leaks, so easy to assemble a child could do it. i WILL be ordering again!!
customer_reviews.author: #StaffordTunes

customer_reviews.title: Good value ,Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very good tent for the price you cant beat it metal frame easy to assemble. Very happy.Quality tent
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Super durable, good zippers, no light leaks. Room to grow two tomato vines from opposite sides! Very happy with this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Henegar

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent, well made only a few slight light leaks needs to be vented to release excess heat, even with the inline fans and ducting but a great sturdy easy to put together tent I have this one and the 3x3x7 and like them both
customer_reviews.author: NotJustMum

customer_reviews.title: Light leaks,  also leaks.
customer_reviews.text: Waited to review product, glad I did. Light leaks all around zipper and vents. So called waterproof tray leaked right through to my carpeting.
customer_reviews.author: Verified purchaser.

customer_reviews.title: Setup breeze - 48 x 24
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Cinching holes at the top and bottom for various plugs and wires. Pleasantly surprised at the design and ease of assembly. Totally recommend for small indoor growing.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like about this gem
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Durable, good zipper and easy to assemble. Plenty of vent / power cord access and choice of sealable vents with Velcro strips. I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Earthsurgeon

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this tent. No light enters or exits this enclosure.
customer_reviews.author: Suk mihoff

customer_reviews.title: I love starting my garden early this tent really helps with that
customer_reviews.text: I use this tent to start garden plants during the middle of winter, I am able to grow 30+ small plants until it is warm enough to move to greenhouse.
customer_reviews.author: William O.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent, poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Nice tent but didn't last throughout my grow process. The zipper went out leaving me with an unuseful grow tent.
customer_reviews.author: Cain

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble !!
customer_reviews.text: This tent works very well for getting indoor house plants started. It was easy to assemble, and fits easily in a confined space. My baby plants are thriving.
customer_reviews.author: Prettyblossom

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works well! I do love this tent, I bought 2, on one the zipper doesn't line up perfectly, but seems to get the job done. Easy to work in, easy to keep clean and organized
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great for anyone looking to do their own organic growing. Product is great for the price. Minimal light leaks around zipper. Other than that it's been amazing. Thanks k you for this quality tent for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lee

customer_reviews.title: ... ago and let me start out saying it's the best bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent about 4 months ago and let me start out saying it's the best bang for buck. It's a real apollohorticulture, the quality is great and reflective Mylar utilizes your lamp to its full potential. I'm on my 3rd grow (2nd time with tent) and all I can say is it's made my plants much easier to maintain. No bugs, no pest, nothing but a clean healthy environment compared to my first grow with out it. Defiantly worth the money 👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a tent! So bright inside, and strong construction.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great tent, strong, easy to assemble, well built. This size fits into a closet easily. The increase in light is amazing, over my home built tent.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Came with everything
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, double draw string is nice on vent holes. Nice for a closet or under steps. Not a lot of room after a charcoal filter and dehumidifier with 3 gallon buckets but its just enough if you want to get a good veg before you plant your garden
customer_reviews.author: First time led grow

customer_reviews.title: Trash tent
customer_reviews.text: Tent came torn zippers didn't work and light bars arrives bent and unable to use
customer_reviews.author: jcc1977

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect in my closet and was easy to assemble.. very professional
customer_reviews.author: Martin Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tent!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, sturdy and metal frame. However if i was to nitpick the instruction graphic is incorrect with the top bar. Overall, a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JasonP

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty grow tent
customer_reviews.text: A very well made item. I set mine up in about ten minutes. Plenty strong for most lighting. I am using it in my garage to start seeds. It appears to be fairly light proof. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: TheWinemaker99336

customer_reviews.title: Grow tent
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for the cost. Ten minutes to assemble and easy to use and move
customer_reviews.author: roscomg

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect.. great quality with the all metal and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect.. great quality with the all metal and strong joints. Pretty easy to setup and is much better than not having one trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, quality product. Zippers look and feel durable. Material feels strong has some weight to it. No light leaks at all and great reflection. Easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: GrowHuntFish

customer_reviews.title: easy light-hanging, keeps light in
customer_reviews.text: First grow tent I've ever owed, and it's everything I wanted. Lots of adjustable vents, easy light-hanging, keeps light in, etc.
customer_reviews.author: MW3

customer_reviews.title: simle and effective
customer_reviews.text: handling starts well. get a small table to have different heights fro varying distance from the light.
customer_reviews.author: JDwashoe

customer_reviews.title: Great grow tent
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this 4 stars for what so far seems like great quality and very heavy duty canvas very sturdy zipper although others have complained about it. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ckygar

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great for growing in small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great for growing in small spaces. Excellent set up with tons of accessible but sealable slots for electric cords or fans. Reflective inside, and bars for hanging lights makes this hard to pass up for a closet grow, or a solid grow if you just don't have a room already set up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer Dude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite grow tent I have purchased I. Solid material great zippers. Minimal light leak! Great choice
customer_reviews.author: Saltwater503

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. I’m using a 400W HID light, a 190CFM fan, and a 6 inch booster fan to cool the light hood. Getting a consistent temperature of 75F using that combo and that is with only one intake flap opened. It has two other flaps I could open if temperatures got higher. A couple light leaks here and there but that is not an issue. I love the extra intake flaps. Because of this I can position the tent in any orientation and open the flap that is facing the freshest and coolest air current.
customer_reviews.author: dchem

customer_reviews.title: It's good enough
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good not as I expected but it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Chello

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: After 4 years of pretty much continuous use this tent still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Scott-Tay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This tent is TREMENDOUS for the money. I have two of them and they are perfect for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Hokie09

product_meta.title: Apollo Horticulture 48”x24”x60” Mylar Hydroponic Grow Tent for Indoor Plant Growing
product_meta.description:
The goal of Apollo Horticulture is simply to be the best value in grow lights. We continually work to produce the highest quality, fully featured, and most up to date hydroponic equipment at the lowest prices possible. We believe that yielding better quality, larger grows does not necessarily mean a higher price tag. The consistency our team delivers year after year, along with unbeatable service, makes up the complete package our customers deserve. It is our commitment to be your guiding light in the world of indoor growing, and to be the grow light company that you will want to do business with again and again.

Welcome to the next generation of grow tents – your new place to cultivate. By choosing Apollo Horticulture, we are pleased to offer you: 
- Durability: Metal frame poles keep your tent secure, and the tent’s thick fabric and quality double stitching prevent any unwanted outside exposure. 
- Protection: Heavy-duty metal zippers protect your home, safeguard your grows, yet offer you easy accessibility to your indoor grown plants. 
- Efficiency: Each tent is lined with 100% light-proof and tear-proof reflective Mylar film, which returns up to 92-97% of your grow light bulbs’ light back to your plants and herbs. Increase your grows without adding to your energy bill! 
- 90-day Warranty: Apollo Horticulture is dedicated to providing quality products backed by unbeatable service in order to give our customers the complete package that they deserve. 

Disclaimer: Apollo Horticulture products are for professional use and are to be used in a green house environment with proper ventilation only. Use of our products in any other environment such as apartments, community housing, or small enclosed spaces is not recommended and may create a potential fire hazard. By purchasing our products, you agree to the recommended use and release all liability of Apollo Horticulture and respective agents for any misuse of the products.
feature_bullets: Package Includes: 1 -48”x 24”x 60” Apollo Horticulture Grow Tent / 1 – Removable Mylar Floor Tray, 2 Filter Straps Included, 1 – Instructional Pamphlet / Size – 48”x 24”x 60” 100% Reflective Tear Proof Mylar / Heavy Duty Zippers & Double Stitching for Light Protection

HIGH QUALITY: 48”x 24”x 60” hydroponics indoor growing tent with heavy-duty zippers and double stitching for light protection ensure durability and long-lasting use. Thick tent material reinforced by the metal poles ensures security and stability. Keep your grows contained, prevent odors from leaking out, and stop pests from getting in.

HIGHLY REFLECTIVE: Includes a removable Mylar floor tray, and a 100% light-proof, tear-proof reflective Mylar lining to assist your indoor growing light fixtures and equipment. Increase the intensity of your grow lights and retain heat to keep your grow room at the right temperature for your plants, herbs, flowers, fruits, and vegetables to thrive.

EASY ASSEMBLY: Includes an instructional pamphlet for easy set up. This is a great hydroponics growing light kit system starter, whether you want to set up your indoor garden in an apartment, condominium, greenhouse, or any rented space.

TOP CUSTOMER CARE: Your Apollo Horticulture Grow Tent for Indoor Plant Growing is backed by our exceptional customer service team and comes standard with the Apollo Horticulture Brand Guarantee and a 90-day warranty. It is our commitment to be your guiding light in the world of indoor growing, and to be the grow light company that you will want to do business with again and again. If our product does not meet or exceed your expectations, we offer a 30-day money back guarantee hassle free.
